Description: Blue glazed composition shabti of Ğd-ḥr, a priest, with a blue painted lappet-wig with a batch-mark at the top, a modelled face with a blue painted beard(damaged) and crossed arms in relief holding a blue painted adze and the string of the seed-bag that hangs over the shoulder; the front of the leg section is inscribed with blue painted Hieroglyphs; there is a back-pillar and a plinth beneath the foot(much missing).
